summary: Sheriff Buford Pusser continues his one-man war against moonshiners and a ruthless crime syndicate after the murder of his wife in late-1960s Tennessee.
cast: Bo Svenson|Luke Askew|John Davis Chandler|Robert DoQui|Leif Garrett|Bruce Glover|Dawn Lyn|Brooke Mills|Logan Ramsey|Lurene Tuttle|Angel Tompkins|Noah Beery Jr.|Richard Jaeckel|Archie Grinalds|Allen Mullikin|Lloyd Tatum|Libby Boone|Jimmy Moore|Frank McRae|William Bryant|Gary M. Darling|Levi Frazier Jr.|Red West|Jon R. Wilson|Ken Zimmerman|Ralph Brown|Chris Ladd|Carey Loftin|Carolyn Stellar
title: Pisando fuerte 2
